reviews.review_msg: Dr. Davis was welcoming, kind, and excellent at explaining concepts. We had a 7-pg term paper, a midterm, and a final. Texts were a little dry, but she elaborated on any misunderstandings. Participation matters for tutorials and is encouraged for lectures, but she doesn't force you. Lectures are heavy and not recorded, but PPs are uploaded.

Huge attitude problem, do not expect any useful feedback. If she decides she has a negative opinion of your work she will treat you poorly to your face, she will not answer clarifying questions, yet she will demand respect when being spoken to. Truly a disgusting woman.
